about.About: Mrsimulator web-app is a plotly-dash user interface to the [mrsimulator package](https://github.com/DeepanshS/mrsimulator) designed for fast and easy solid-state NMR lineshape simulation.
about.Report issues:
- Having trouble with the web-app user-interface, please open an [issue](https://github.com/DeepanshS/mrsimulator-app/issues) and tell us about the problem.
- Finding inconsistency with the NMR line-shape simulation, please open an [issue](https://github.com/DeepanshS/mrsimulator/issues) and tell us about the inconsistency.
